dmv.spring.demo.model.repository.jdbc

Class RoleRepositoryJDBC

  • java.lang.Object
    • dmv.spring.demo.model.repository.jdbc.RoleRepositoryJDBC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RoleRepository

    @Repository
 @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public class RoleRepositoryJDBC
extends Object
implements RoleRepository
    Querying table ROLE via JDBC according to RoleRepository specification.

    Single statement SQL queries are used

    Offers simple caching solution as for now we have only three predefined roles and no mutators. So, avoiding unnecessary DB querying.

    Author:
    dmv
